MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G44 postcode area of Glasgow, affecting properties in Ashcroft Drive and surrounding streets. We are aware of previous power cuts affecting your property. We had restored supplies via generator however it has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown to allow safe digging on site due to a dangerous cable and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4.00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:54pm on Monday, 11 January 2021.
